slackInstance.description: The dataplatform instance that this Slack member belongs to.

id.description: The unique identifier for the Slack member.

name.description: The username of the Slack member.

realName.description: The real name of the Slack member.

displayName.description: The display name of the Slack member.

email.description: The email associated with the Slack member.

teamId.description: The ID associated with the Slack team.

isDeleted.description: Whether the member is deleted or not.

isAdmin.description: Whether the member is an admin.

isOwner.description: Whether the member is an owner.

isPrimaryOwner.description: Whether the member is a primary owner.

isBot.description: Whether the member is a bot.

timezone.description: The timezone of the Slack member.

timezoneOffset.description: The timezone offset of the Slack member.

title.description: The title of the Slack member.

phone.description: The phone number of the Slack member.

profilePictureUrl.description: The URL of the member's profile picture.

statusText.description: The status text of the Slack member.

statusEmoji.description: The status emoji of the Slack member.

lastUpdatedSeconds.description: The timestamp of when the member was last updated. (in seconds)
